description: This file defines configuration handling for MongoDB using environment variables, including a dataclass for configuration data and a loader function that reads environment variables and raises errors if they are missing.

classes.name: MongoConfig
classes.description: Dataclass representing MongoDB configuration loaded from environment variables.

methods.name: MongoConfig load_mongo_config()
methods.description: Function to load MongoDB connection URI and database name from environment variables, raising an error if they are missing.
